experience: You and Chris both know Ed Nusbaum, Greg Head, and 12 others

As Founder, Board member, and Chief Strategy Officer, Chris executes the company’s efforts around strategic planning, product direction, M & A, business development, messaging, and sales and support delivery.About Priasoft.Priasoft, Inc, headquartered in Arizona, is the recognized expert in the Microsoft Exchange server Migration and Management software market by delivering the first enterprise migration product back in 1999. Software solutions from Priasoft are used every day on Windows servers and desktops around the world. Priasoft’s customers cover small, mid-sized and large market-leading companies worldwide to manage, control and optimize the performance, availability and security of their IT infrastructures.
Consultant - Project Manager, Microsoft infrastructure/Messaging and Collaboration

Strategic Consulting, planning and migration to Windows 2000/2003 and Exchange 2000/2003. Peoplesoft to Exchange intergration. Technical lead on 4 major technology integration projects for acquisitions and divestures the company engaged in.
Strategic Consulting - main focus was on business automation projects, LDAP directory integration, M&A, and 50,000 + seat Exchange migration project.
Consultant - Microsoft Infrastructure, Flight Information Systems
Consultant Microsoft infrastructure - Worked on email and early intranet projects

summary: Chris is a veteran and active champion of innovation in the messaging and collaboration industry with specific focus on Microsoft Exchange on-premises and Office365 cloud technologies. As Founder, Board member, and Chief Strategy Officer, Chris executes the company’s efforts around strategic planning, product direction, M & A, business development, messaging, and sales and support delivery. Specialties: Exchange, Active Directory, Cloud, Innovation, decentralization, automation, messaging and collaboration, strategic planning, software, start-ups, & project management.http://www.priasoft.com
